# 7.11.0
## Added
- Support for tooltip

# 7.10.0
## Changed
- Extension of mouseEvent property data type for easier using in case of emitting of original bobril mouse event

# 7.9.4
## Fixed
- Update main property in package.json from src/lib.js to src/lib.ts to be compatible with webpack

# 7.9.3
## Fixed
- Wrapper click on subitem is not propagated correctly
- Add system test

# 7.9.2
## Fixed
- Add system test for selected item

# 7.9.1
## Added
- Support of WCAG
- Each item has focus if is selected
## Fixed
- First selected item via keyboard is according to actual selected item

# 7.9.0
## Added
- Navigation via keys
- System tests
- optional 'id' property for IContextMenuContent for easier finding sub context menu via automated tests

# 7.8.2
## Fixed
- Compatibility with latest version of BBSeeker

# 7.8.1
## Fixed
- Compatibility with latest components

# 7.8.0
## Changed
- Changed default behavior of 'Copy' item - disabled by default

# 7.7.0
## Added
- Optionally property isHeader to menu items

# 7.6.0
## Added
- Optional property shouldCloseOnScroll (is true by default)

# 7.5.1
## Added
- Auto-generated export with component's name

# 7.5.0
## Added
- Added wrapper property to menu items

# 7.4.4
## Fixed
- Fixed dependencies

# 7.4.3
## Added
- Update to Typescript 3.1.3

# 7.4.2
## Added
- added comment for translators for term 'Copy'

# 7.4.0
## Added
- Added mouseEvent to onClick function on menu item

# 7.3.5
## Added
- Key for menu item

# 7.3.4
## Added
- E2E test

# 7.3.3
## Fixed
- Update calling of b.addScroll without context, use b.addDisposable for unregister it

# 7.3.0
## Added
- Optionally property hasStaticPosition - suitable for using inside bobwai--action-with-window component

##Fixed
- add calling of onClose callback also in case of useChildScope configuration

# 7.2.0
## Added
- Disabled item does not open context menu with subitems

# 7.1.0
## Added
- If is selection with text in browser, menu contains only one item ("Copy") - enabled by default
- New attr "isClipboardMenuDisabled" - disable this functionality

# 7.0.0
## Added
- Constant override available via setMinWidth
